remarks: A constant function is uniformly continuous.  Deduction form.  Example 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p.  II.6.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Nov-2017.)
statement:
cstucnd.1 $e |- ( ph -> U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) ) $.
cstucnd.2 $e |- ( ph -> V e. ( UnifOn ` Y ) ) $.
cstucnd.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Y ) $.
cstucnd $p |- ( ph -> ( X X. { A } ) e. ( U uCn V ) ) $.
